portfolio.title: Apocalypse Manga Jacket
portfolio.description: A manga jacket/sleeve designed to resemble the book-like character 'Apocalypse' himself from the 'Undead Unluck' manga by Yoshifumi Tozuka.

portfolio.title: Yatora in Blue
portfolio.description: An all blue colored artwork of the main character from the 'Blue Period' manga by Tsubasa Yamaguchi.

portfolio.title: The Great Pretenders
portfolio.description: A digital artwork of the two main characters from the Netflix original anime titled 'The Great Pretender'
